Tucson ceases his fire.  With his warning shot made, he rolls forward on hi=
s wheels with the light damage not effecting his engine nor his wheels.  He=
 wasn't ready to quit, not by any means.  Small damage were like moon pebbl=
es under his tires, simply roll with them and roll over them.  

In the mea=
n time, Straight Shot taps on Perceptor's shoulder to let him know that it =
was safe once again to turn on his audio receptors. 

"It's okay, he's turn=
ed it off."

The truck continues his relentless push forward.

" Hit me all=
 you want, I'm not going anywhere except forward.  We came here to retrieve=
 our comrade, no matter what slag you throw at us.  That is all we want, no=
thing more nothing less.  We are not here to take over anything or anyone. =
Let us find Rodimus, and bring him home, and we will leave you undesturbed.=
"
